name: Axe Game
description:
You play as a lumberjack hurling his axe into the sky to cut down falling obstacles! Enemies will run at you from the sides slay them all! Just don't forget to catch your axe. The fate of the world depends on it.

All Music By Kevin MacLeod

Music from https://filmmusic.io:
"Gymnopedie No. 1" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
Licence: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
